short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: American Cities Montage Painter James Conner. Custom Portraits, Framing and personalized gifts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: James Conner Art Gallery is the website for Portrait Painter of American Cities.  James Conner has been commissioned to do several American Cities and all are sold across America.  We also offer custom framing services, custom portraits and create custom gifts. We can create wholesale items for your company to sell. Visit Chicago, Detroit, Indianapolis, Dayton, Flint and other Great American Cities with these great works of art.  Visit us today and purchase any of the American artist's works.  Available in several different formats and products.  From mugs, tiles and prints to framed pieces and greeting cards.  Check out our photo restoration or custom give creation services available on our site.  We also sell inspirational items created from the original image of Christ done by Conner when he was on 19 years of age.   Along with several different Giclee prints with matching ceramic mugs we can find the artwork that you want.
